div.p: This code system http://cancerscreeningcds.github.io/crcsm-cds/CodeSystem/c-rads-2005-code-system defines the following codes:

tr.td: C-RADS Category 0 - Inadequate study/awaiting prior comparisons
C-RADS Category 1 - Normal colon or benign lesion
C-RADS Category 2a - Intermediate polyp or indeterminate finding
C-RADS Category 2b - Likely benign diverticular finding
C-RADS Category 3 - Polyp, possibly advanced adenoma
C-RADS Category 4 - Colonic mass, likely malignant

title.value: CT Colonography Reporting and Data System (C-RADS)

description.value: Codes for C-RADS v2005 colorectal finding categories.

display.value: C-RADS Category 0 - Inadequate study/awaiting prior comparisons
C-RADS Category 1 - Normal colon or benign lesion
C-RADS Category 2a - Intermediate polyp or indeterminate finding
C-RADS Category 2b - Likely benign diverticular finding
C-RADS Category 3 - Polyp, possibly advanced adenoma
C-RADS Category 4 - Colonic mass, likely malignant
